title: Ranked Button disappeared?
body:
Just updated Alpha client, and noticed that there is no ranked button at top at all now.

I know it was disabled for a long time, but why did riot suddenly **removed** it? Just curious...

replies.body: Wasnt ranked suposed to came last patch?
They decided to delay the release of ranked because they want to improve the client's performance first
Yea..but did they say anything about it coming in this patch?

Not coming this patch and most likely not the next one either, they decided not to untill they improve the client performance, I think It's a good decision, nobody wants to lag out or crash while trying out ranked right?

> [{quoted}](name=Fisherman Fízz,realm=EUW,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=2moH6PNF,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2016-09-22T15:07:24.118+0000)
>
> Not coming this patch and most likely not the next one either, they decided not to untill they improve the client performance, I think It's a good decision, nobody wants to lag out or crash while trying out ranked right?

this
Yea..but the funny thing is that my old client crashes more than alpha xD
Sometimes during 0.9 of alpha. I bet they just found something that delayed it

In the most recent update they said "Unfortunately, we hit some snags that have delayed the launch of ranked."
In addition to that they renamed the section to "PvP". Maybe they are moving the ranked queue inside the PvP section (e.g. as a third option below blind and draft) and therefore it was removed from the top.
I'm pretty sure it will reappear somewhere as soon as they launch ranked. Don't worry :)
Might be because the hour? Idk. :s
